MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12pm to replace faulty equipment on our overhead line network near Over Dalgleish and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40am on 13th of October 2020.
